argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_1z | |- 1 e. ZZ |
| 2 |  | #P_zq | |- ( 1 e. ZZ -> 1 e. QQ ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_ax-mp | |- 1 e. QQ |
| 4 |  | #P_ax1ne0 | |- 1 =/= 0 |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_pm3.2i | |- ( 1 e. QQ /\ 1 =/= 0 ) |
| 6 |  | #P_pcqdiv | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ ( 1 e. QQ /\ 1 =/= 0 ) /\ ( A e. QQ /\ A =/= 0 ) ) -> ( P pCnt ( 1 / A ) ) = ( ( P pCnt 1 ) - ( P pCnt A ) ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_mp3an2 | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ ( A e. QQ /\ A =/= 0 ) ) -> ( P pCnt ( 1 / A ) ) = ( ( P pCnt 1 ) - ( P pCnt A ) ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_pc1 | |- ( P e. Prime -> ( P pCnt 1 ) = 0 ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ ( A e. QQ /\ A =/= 0 ) ) -> ( P pCnt 1 ) = 0 ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ ( A e. QQ /\ A =/= 0 ) ) -> ( ( P pCnt 1 ) - ( P pCnt A ) ) = ( 0 - ( P pCnt A ) ) ) |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ ( A e. QQ /\ A =/= 0 ) ) -> ( P pCnt ( 1 / A ) ) = ( 0 - ( P pCnt A ) ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_df-neg | |- -u ( P pCnt A ) = ( 0 - ( P pCnt A ) ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ ( A e. QQ /\ A =/= 0 ) ) -> ( P pCnt ( 1 / A ) ) = -u ( P pCnt A ) ) |
